org.forgerock.openig.log

Class LogTimer

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.forgerock.openig.log.LogTimer

  • public class LogTimer
extends Object
    Records elapsed time in a log in milliseconds.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      LogTimer(LogSink sink)
      Constructs a new timer with a logging level of STAT.
      LogTimer(LogSink sink, LogLevel level)
      Constructs a new timer to log events at a specified logging level.
      LogTimer(LogSink sink, LogLevel level, String event)
      Constructs a new timer to log events of a specific type at a specific logging level.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      LogTimer start()
      Starts the timer.
      void stop()
      Stops the timer and records the elapsed time in a metric.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Constructor Detail

      • LogTimer

        public LogTimer(LogSink sink)
        Constructs a new timer with a logging level of STAT.
        Parameters:
        sink - the sink to record timer log entries to.

      • LogTimer

        public LogTimer(LogSink sink,
        LogLevel level)
        Constructs a new timer to log events at a specified logging level.
        Parameters:
        sink - the sink to record timer log entries to.
        level - the logging level to record timer log entries with.

      • LogTimer

        public LogTimer(LogSink sink,
        LogLevel level,
        String event)
        Constructs a new timer to log events of a specific type at a specific logging level.
        Parameters:
        sink - the sink to record timer log entries to.
        level - the logging level to record timer log entries with.
        event - the event being timed.

    • Method Detail

      • start

        public LogTimer start()
        Starts the timer. Records a log entry indicating the timer has been started.
        Returns:
        this timer instance.

      • stop

        public void stop()
        Stops the timer and records the elapsed time in a metric.
